question.text: "Which HTTP messages have an empty body?"
question.choice1: "A GET response message with a status code of 200 (OK) delivers the requested information (e.g., a HTML document) in its message body."
question.choice2: "A POST request message needs a message body for transporting any information such as (form submission) parameter values or a message payload."
question.choice3: "A GET request message may transmit queryÂ parameter values encoded as part of the path, but it does not use a message body."
question.choice4: "A POST response message transmits the confirmation or error message in its message body."

question.text: "The Prolog of an XML document is optional. It may include the following:"
question.choice4: "The root element of the XML document"
